allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(quick-003\): wire missing SBLOC config parameters in monte-carlo.ts

- Use config.sbloc.liquidationHaircut instead of hardcoded 0.05
- Use config.timeline.withdrawalStartYear instead of hardcoded startYear: 0
- Implement annual withdrawal raises using config.sbloc.annualWithdrawalRaise
- Pass config.sbloc.initialLocBalance to initializeSBLOCState
- Update cumulativeWithdrawals calculation to account for raises

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs\(quick-003\): complete wire missing SBLOC config parameters task

Tasks completed: 1/1
- Wire SBLOC config parameters in monte-carlo.ts

SUMMARY: .planning/quick/003-resolve-key-missing-simulation-logic/003-SUMMARY.md

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
